subject: Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2012)
Athletics and Sports
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: In just seven months, Kirani James, a teenager from the tiny island nation of Grenada, went from best to worst in a championship final, and now he's carrying his nation's hopes to the Olympics in London.
snippet: In just seven months, Kirani James, a teenager from the tiny island nation of Grenada, went from best to worst in a championship final, and now he's carrying his nation's hopes to the Olympics in London.
